matrix_metadata.color_theory_approach: Temperature-based relationships with saturation evolution tracking character growth. Warm protagonists vs cool antagonist, with neutral elder wisdom. Color intensity increases Act 1→3 representing emotional opening.
matrix_metadata.primary_palette_strategy: Hybrid analog-digital aesthetic: warm human colors (coral, earth tones) contrast with cool surveillance colors (slate, steel). Visual storytelling through chromatic temperature and saturation levels.

luna_reyes.rationale: Fast, bright, connecting, electrifying - represents her intelligence and speed of thought, plus her journey from isolated spark to network conductor

color_identity.temperature_kelvin: 3800K (warm golden hour moving toward 4500K neutral by Act 3)
color_identity.saturation_level: Medium in Act 1, High in Act 3

personality_color_mapping.brilliant_but_isolated: Warm skin tone contrasts with cool digital blue - humanity vs technology tension
personality_color_mapping.witty_deflection: Coral/peach brightness - humor as light in darkness
personality_color_mapping.tech_integration: Steel blue digital accents integrated naturally, not dominating
personality_color_mapping.family_anchor: Silver bracelet constant - grounding element in all color states

color_evolution.act_1: Muted warm tones (45% saturation) + prominent cool digital blues. Represents isolation in digital world. Palette dominated by grays and blues with warm skin tone feeling separate.
color_evolution.act_2: Gradual warming - coral begins appearing (60% saturation). Digital blue becomes warmer teal. Integration beginning. Conflicts visible as warm/cool clashes.
color_evolution.act_3: Vibrant warm palette (75% saturation) - coral/peach dominant, teal fully integrated as warm accent. Represents complete emotional opening and digital-analog synthesis.

grandmothers_bracelet.meaning: Silver = timeless wisdom, analog connection, family continuity. Always visible in every scene - constant amid change.

coding_screens.meaning: Steel blue → Light sea green. Digital world warming from cold to organic.

signature_sneakers.meaning: Burgundy = individuality, slight rebelliousness, constant self amid growth

mateo_silva.rationale: Slow-burning, warm, spreads naturally, illuminates surroundings - represents his patient passion and how he warms Luna's cold digital world

color_identity.saturation_percentage: Consistent 65% - he's emotionally open from start

personality_color_mapping.passionate_artist: Earth tones with vibrant paint accents - grounded creativity
personality_color_mapping.street_wisdom: Urban greens and browns - belongs to physical world
personality_color_mapping.patient_warmth: Consistent warm temperature - doesn't cool when frustrated
personality_color_mapping.analog_advocate: Natural pigment colors vs digital RGB - represents physical world
personality_color_mapping.romantic_heart: Golden highlights when vulnerable - inner light

color_evolution.act_1: Earth tones dominant, slightly dusty (streetwise survival). Gold accents minimal - creativity suppressed by circumstances.
color_evolution.act_2: Gold accents increase as creativity flourishes through Luna's support. Earth tones brighten - hope growing.
color_evolution.act_3: Full warmth - earth tones + vibrant paint colors + golden highlights. Represents realized potential and partnership with Luna.

spray_paint_cans.meaning: Tomato red = passion, visibility, making the invisible seen (opposite of Luna's initial invisibility goal)

projection_art_light.meaning: Gold = illumination, truth, beauty in darkness. His art literally brings light.

comandante_vega.rationale: Cold, crystalline, beautiful but dangerous, preserves (controls) - represents her belief in order through control, aesthetically appealing authoritarianism

personality_color_mapping.controlled_authority: Desaturated cool tones - emotion locked away
personality_color_mapping.sophisticated_threat: Slate grays not pure black - intelligence not brutality
personality_color_mapping.former_idealist: Steel blue hints at Luna's colors - shows shared past/potential
personality_color_mapping.desperate_grasping: Dark red bleeds through when losing control
personality_color_mapping.surveillance_state: Cool blues = digital monitoring, inhuman systems

color_evolution.act_1: Perfectly controlled slate grays and steel blues. Sophisticated, almost appealing. Professional polish.
color_evolution.act_2: Cracks appear - dark reds bleed through (anger, desperation). Blues become harsher, less nuanced.
color_evolution.act_3: Desaturation increases further (losing humanity) OR slight warming (redemption hint). Dark reds dominant when desperate. Final frame: slight blue-to-teal shift (possibility of change).

ministry_building.meaning: Slate gray = cold modernity, surveillance aesthetic, intimidation through architecture

rank_insignia.meaning: Silver = same as Luna's bracelet (twisted mirror - both represent values, but opposite values)

suppressed_passion.meaning: Dark red = buried idealism now manifesting as control, what she could have been

abuela_carmen.rationale: Ancient, weathered, enduring, foundation - represents timeless wisdom, grounding, the base upon which Luna builds

color_identity.saturation_percentage: Weathered but warm - time has muted but not cooled
color_identity.value_range: Mid to light (50-70% brightness - wise but not dominating)

personality_color_mapping.ancient_wisdom: Weathered warm tones - time has passed but warmth remains
personality_color_mapping.analog_champion: Organic colors only - no digital blues/teals
personality_color_mapping.family_matriarch: Wheat and tan - nourishing colors, sustenance
personality_color_mapping.quiet_strength: Low saturation high value - powerful without loudness

color_evolution.act_1: Steady warm earth tones. Constant amid chaos. Represents stability.
color_evolution.act_2: Unchanged - she is the anchor while others storm. Reliability visualized.
color_evolution.act_3: Slight brightness increase (higher value) - vindication, proud. But core colors unchanged - wisdom doesn't evolve, it endures.

recipe_book.meaning: Moccasin (aged paper) = analog knowledge, tradition, sustenance both literal and metaphorical

philosophy_texts.meaning: Saddle brown (leather binding) = preserved knowledge, weight of history

tio_felix.rationale: Malleable, adaptable, shaped by use, practical - represents his surprising adaptability and how he connects digital and analog through bodega

color_identity.saturation_percentage: Approachable warmth - not muted, not vibrant

personality_color_mapping.comic_warmth: Sandy browns and warm tans - approachable, comfortable
personality_color_mapping.practical_wisdom: Peru and burlywood - working colors, not decorative
personality_color_mapping.bridge_builder: Colors sit between Luna's cool-warm mix and Mateo's pure warm
personality_color_mapping.hidden_competence: Gold accents reveal inner worth beneath humble exterior
personality_color_mapping.community_hub: Bodega browns - gathering place, sustenance provider

color_evolution.act_1: Dusty browns - survival mode, struggling business. Muted tones.
color_evolution.act_2: Browns brighten, gold accents appear - network hub revealed. Value increases.
color_evolution.act_3: Full warm palette - thriving community center. Sandy browns vibrant, gold prominent. Success visualized through color.

bodega_shelves.meaning: Saddle brown = reliability, provision, community resource

good_heart.meaning: Gold = hidden value, true worth beneath comic exterior

luna_x_mateo.relationship_type: Romantic partnership - opposites attract, complementary strengths
luna_x_mateo.color_relationship: Complementary temperature with shared warmth - Luna's warm skin + cool digital vs Mateo's pure warm earth tones. Creates balanced orange-blue-green triad when together.
luna_x_mateo.visual_dynamic: Her digital cools invade his analog warmth initially (conflict). Mid-story: colors begin blending (teal appears in both palettes). End-story: harmonious warm palette with integrated cool accents (synthesis).

evolution_across_acts.act_1: Visual tension - her cool blues vs his warm browns create uncomfortable contrast. Shot composition keeps them separated. Lighting: cool on her, warm on him. Represents ideological distance.
evolution_across_acts.act_2: Colors begin mixing - teal appears as bridge color. She wears warmer clothing, his colors brighten. Shot composition: closer but not touching. Lighting: mixed warm-cool showing integration beginning.
evolution_across_acts.act_3: Harmonious palette - shared warm dominance with cool accents both use. Coral + earth tones create unified field. Shot composition: overlapping, sharing frame comfortably. Lighting: unified warm golden hour.

scene_composition_guidance.when_together: Act 1: Split composition, cool/warm divide visible. Act 2: Overlapping frames, color bleeding. Act 3: Unified composition, complementary not competing.
scene_composition_guidance.lighting_strategy: Act 1: Split key - cool on Luna, warm on Mateo. Act 2: Mixed lighting with warm gaining dominance. Act 3: Unified warm key with cool rim accents.
scene_composition_guidance.background_approach: Act 1: Neutral grays allow contrast. Act 2: Warm backgrounds support their growing connection. Act 3: Vibrant unified palette.
scene_composition_guidance.spatial_relationship: Physical distance in frame mirrors emotional distance. Colors don't blend until characters physically close. Final kiss scene: colors merge completely in frame.

emotional_palette.first_meeting: #4682B4 (her digital cool) vs #8B4513 (his earth warm) - maximum contrast

luna_x_vega.color_relationship: Temperature clash + saturation contrast - Luna's warm medium saturation vs Vega's cool low saturation. Both have steel blue but Luna's warms to teal while Vega's stays cold.
luna_x_vega.visual_dynamic: Luna's warmth attempts to penetrate Vega's cold space. Vega's desaturation tries to drain Luna's vibrancy. Battle of chromatic energy - warm life vs cool control.
luna_x_vega.harmony_evolution: Act 1: 4/10 (Vega seems reasonable), Act 2: 2/10 (opposition clear), Act 3: 3/10 (slight warmth hint = redemption possibility)

evolution_across_acts.act_1: Vega's cool professionalism vs Luna's emerging warmth. Visual: Vega's slate grays almost appealing, Luna's muted tones seem drab by comparison. Threat not obvious.
evolution_across_acts.act_2: Temperature war visible. Luna's colors warming, Vega's cooling further. Dark red bleeds into Vega (desperation). Visual clash intensifies.
evolution_across_acts.act_3: Maximum contrast then slight softening. Luna fully vibrant warm, Vega desaturated cold. Final frame: tiny teal shift in Vega (redemption possibility, mirrors Luna's journey).

scene_composition_guidance.when_together: Physical distance mandatory - opposite sides of frame. Cool/warm split lighting. Vega in shadows, Luna in light. Colors compete, don't blend.
scene_composition_guidance.lighting_strategy: Split dramatically. Vega: cool fluorescent (6500K), Luna: warm natural (3800K). No mixing until final scene where Luna's warmth slightly affects Vega's space.
scene_composition_guidance.background_approach: When in Vega's space (Ministry): cold grays dominate, Luna's warmth struggles. When in Luna's space: warm dominates, Vega's cold invasive. Neutral: gray battleground.
scene_composition_guidance.spatial_relationship: Maximum frame distance. Use reflections/screens to show them (surveillance motif). When physically close: color temperature clash must be visible and uncomfortable.

luna_x_abuela.color_relationship: Analogous warm with generational difference - Luna's vibrant coral vs Abuela's weathered tan. Shared warmth, different saturation levels.
luna_x_abuela.visual_dynamic: Abuela's steady warm earth tones provide foundation for Luna's chromatic journey. Luna's colors literally grow from Abuela's palette.
luna_x_abuela.harmony_evolution: Consistent 8/10 - always harmonious, Luna's growth makes harmony richer not creates it

evolution_across_acts.act_1: Luna muted, Abuela steady. Visual: Luna's potential warmth visible but suppressed, Abuela fully expressed.
evolution_across_acts.act_2: Luna warming toward Abuela's palette. Recipe book scenes: colors blend beautifully.
evolution_across_acts.act_3: Luna's full warmth complements Abuela's weathered warmth. Different life stages, shared values visualized through analogous warm palette.

scene_composition_guidance.when_together: Close framing, colors blend naturally. Warm lighting unified. Comfortable spatial proximity.
scene_composition_guidance.lighting_strategy: Warm unified (3800-4200K). Candlelight, kitchen warmth, hearthfire quality. Never cool or harsh.
scene_composition_guidance.background_approach: Warm domestic spaces - kitchen, living room. Earth tones, wood, fabric. Supporting not competing.
scene_composition_guidance.spatial_relationship: Physical closeness = color closeness. Recipe book scenes: their hands in frame together, colors unified.

mateo_x_vega.relationship_type: Oppositional - artist vs authority, visibility vs surveillance
mateo_x_vega.color_relationship: Pure warm (Mateo earth tones + gold light) vs pure cool (Vega slate grays). Maximum temperature contrast.
mateo_x_vega.visual_dynamic: Mateo's art literally projects warm light onto Vega's cold spaces. His colors invade her world through projection art - visual activism.
mateo_x_vega.harmony_evolution: Consistently 1/10 - no reconciliation, pure opposition throughout

evolution_across_acts.act_1: Indirect opposition - his warm street art vs her cool surveillance. Don't share frame yet.
evolution_across_acts.act_2: Direct confrontation - warm vs cool split lighting when they meet. Temperature war.
evolution_across_acts.act_3: His golden projection art on her slate Ministry building - warm conquers cool visually. She cannot escape his warmth/light/truth.

scene_composition_guidance.when_together: Maximum color conflict. Split frame dramatically. His warmth one side, her cool other. Uncomfortable to view - intentional.
scene_composition_guidance.lighting_strategy: Never unified. His warm natural light vs her cool fluorescent. Even when in same space, light sources compete.
scene_composition_guidance.background_approach: Battleground - neutral grays. Or his warm invading her cool space (projection art scenes).
scene_composition_guidance.spatial_relationship: Physical distance when possible. When close: color temperature clash must be viscerally uncomfortable.

emotional_palette.projection_art_climax: #FFD700 + #FF6347 (warm light + red passion) projects onto #708090 (her slate building)

abuela_x_vega.relationship_type: Philosophical opposition - ancient wisdom vs modern control
abuela_x_vega.color_relationship: Warm weathered (Abuela earth tones) vs cool synthetic (Vega slate grays). Natural vs artificial.
abuela_x_vega.visual_dynamic: Abuela's organic warmth remains unaffected by Vega's cold. Stone doesn't freeze.

evolution_across_acts.act_1: Haven't met - Abuela's warm kitchen vs Vega's cold office (parallel contrast).
evolution_across_acts.act_2: When Vega detains Abuela - Abuela's warmth doesn't diminish in cold space. Visual: her earth tones remain saturated even in gray interrogation room.
evolution_across_acts.act_3: Abuela emerged unchanged. Her colors stable throughout - wisdom endures.

scene_composition_guidance.when_together: Abuela's warmth islands in Vega's cold sea. Low saturation cool surroundings, but Abuela remains fully saturated warm.
scene_composition_guidance.lighting_strategy: Cool harsh light on space, but Abuela seems to generate her own warm light (inner strength).
scene_composition_guidance.background_approach: Vega's cold spaces cannot drain Abuela's color - visual metaphor for unbreakable spirit.
scene_composition_guidance.spatial_relationship: Abuela centered, grounded. Vega moves around her. Stone vs wind.

emotional_palette.detention_scene: #F5DEB3 (Abuela's wheat warmth) remains vibrant in #2F4F4F (Vega's dark slate) space

tio_felix_x_luna.relationship_type: Familial - uncle-niece, comic relief + hidden wisdom
tio_felix_x_luna.color_relationship: Analogous warm - his sandy browns bridge her coral and Mateo's earth tones. He's chromatic mediator.
tio_felix_x_luna.visual_dynamic: His consistent warm approachability creates safe space for her chromatic evolution. Bodega browns are neutral warm ground.
tio_felix_x_luna.harmony_evolution: Consistent 7/10 - always supportive, grows richer as Luna opens

scene_composition_guidance.when_together: Warm unified palette. His browns + her corals create inviting space. Bodega scenes warmly lit.
scene_composition_guidance.lighting_strategy: Warm afternoon sun through bodega windows (3600K). Comfortable, welcoming.
scene_composition_guidance.background_approach: Bodega browns + product colors create rich warm environment supporting both.
scene_composition_guidance.spatial_relationship: Casual proximity. His color field welcoming to hers.

family_dinner_act1.scene_description: Act 1, Pages 15-18: Family dinner, Luna isolated with laptop despite physical presence
family_dinner_act1.dominant_character_energy: Abuela (warm earth tones) dominates, Luna's cool digital creates tension
family_dinner_act1.color_strategy: Harmony interrupted - warm family palette vs Luna's cool isolation

palette_specification.lighting_temperature: Warm 3400K overhead + 6500K laptop screen on Luna's face (split)

family_dinner_act1.emotional_goal: Viewer should feel warm family love + discomfort at Luna's chromatic and emotional distance
family_dinner_act1.composition_notes: Frame family in warm golden triangle composition. Luna on edge of frame, face lit by cold blue screen glow. Color temperature split visible and uncomfortable.

bodega_network_meeting_act2.scene_description: Act 2A, Pages 52-56: First network meeting, diverse community gathering
bodega_network_meeting_act2.dominant_character_energy: Tio Felix (sandy brown - gathering space) with Luna/Mateo energies merging
bodega_network_meeting_act2.color_strategy: Harmonious warm gathering with Luna's cool-to-warm transition visible

palette_specification.lighting_temperature: Warm 3800K ambient + 4200K (laptop screens integrated, not dominating)

bodega_network_meeting_act2.emotional_goal: Warmth, safety, belonging. Luna finding her place in analog community.
bodega_network_meeting_act2.composition_notes: Circular gathering composition. Warm light from above. Laptop screens present but not cool-toned - showing integration. Colors blend naturally.

ministry_confrontation_act3.scene_description: Act 3, Pages 105-115: Final ideological battle, Ministry building
ministry_confrontation_act3.dominant_character_energy: Luna (vibrant warm) conquering Vega's space (desaturated cool)
ministry_confrontation_act3.color_strategy: Temperature war - warm truth vs cool control, warm winning

palette_specification.lighting_temperature: Split then convergence: 6500K cool interior being invaded by 3200K warm projection light

ministry_confrontation_act3.emotional_goal: Triumph of warmth over cold, hope over control, community over isolation. Cathartic chromatic victory.
ministry_confrontation_act3.composition_notes: Start: Vega's cool dominates frame. Progress: warm light invades from edges. Climax: warm light floods entire space, cool corners disappearing. Luna central, backlit by golden projection.

rooftop_finale_act3.scene_description: Act 3, Pages 114-120: Final scene, Luna + community on rooftop, city below
rooftop_finale_act3.dominant_character_energy: Unified warm palette - all characters harmonized
rooftop_finale_act3.color_strategy: Complete harmony - digital and analog, individual and community, all colors unified in warm sunset
rooftop_finale_act3.emotional_goal: Earned peace, hopeful future, synthesis complete. Viewer should feel warm, satisfied, inspired.
rooftop_finale_act3.composition_notes: Wide shot showing community together. Everyone sharing warm palette. City below lit by mixture of their colors - they've changed the world. Sky transitions cool blue → warm teal → golden - visual metaphor for journey complete.

act_1.dominant_temperature: Cool with muted warm - digital world dominates
act_1.saturation_trend: Low to medium (35-55% average) - muted, suppressed
act_1.emotional_tone: Isolated efficiency, cold competence, suppressed humanity
act_1.narrative_meaning: Digital isolation, potential warmth suppressed, cold systems dominating human warmth. Visual discomfort intentional - wrong path.

act_2a.emotional_tone: Hope building, connection emerging, struggle between systems and humanity
act_2a.narrative_meaning: Integration beginning, hope building, but opposition present. Teal bridge color crucial - represents possible synthesis.

act_2b.dominant_temperature: Battle of extremes - hot and cold clashing
act_2b.saturation_trend: Polarized - warm very saturated (75%), cool very desaturated (30%)
act_2b.emotional_tone: Desperation, everything at stake, chromatic warfare
act_2b.narrative_meaning: All is lost moment visualized through color. Warm desperately bright (last stand), cool oppressively dark (crushing force). Maximum tension.

act_3.narrative_meaning: Warm palette dominates, cool fully integrated (not eliminated). Represents synthesis - technology serving humanity, individual within community, digital tools enabling human connection. Visual resolution of all color conflicts.

grandmothers_bracelet_silver.description: Silver bracelet with book charm - visible on Luna's wrist in every scene
grandmothers_bracelet_silver.symbolic_meaning: Analog wisdom, family continuity, constant amid change. Mirrors Vega's silver insignia (twisted reflection - values vs control).
grandmothers_bracelet_silver.evolution: Constant color, but prominence increases - hidden in sleeves Act 1, visible Act 2, highlighted Act 3. Represents accepting family connection.

teal_bridge_color.description: Teal/light sea green - appears midpoint Act 2A as digital world warms
teal_bridge_color.symbolic_meaning: Synthesis of cool digital blue + warm human green. Represents technology serving humanity. The answer to the story's chromatic question.
teal_bridge_color.evolution: Absent Act 1 → Emerges Act 2A → Common Act 2B → Integrated Act 3. Tracks Luna's journey from digital-OR-analog to digital-AND-analog.

golden_light_hope.description: Golden accents - appears with connection, community, hope moments
golden_light_hope.symbolic_meaning: Hope, truth, illumination, shared warmth. Literal light in darkness (Mateo's art). Metaphorical light of community.
golden_light_hope.evolution: Rare/absent Act 1 → Flickers Act 2 → Prominent Act 3. Represents hope building across narrative.

dark_red_stakes.description: Dark red - appears in high-stakes, danger, or suppressed passion moments
dark_red_stakes.symbolic_meaning: Danger, blood, high stakes. Also: suppressed idealism in Vega. Dual meaning - threat and buried humanity.
dark_red_stakes.evolution: Absent early → Bleeds into Vega's palette Act 2B (desperation) → Present in Luna's determination Act 3. Same color, different meaning by context.

palette_usage_guide.#8B4513: Earth brown - grounding, Mateo, family, bodega
palette_usage_guide.#CD853F: Sandy brown - Felix, bridge character, welcome

forbidden_colors: #FF00FF (Pure magenta - too artificial, clashes with established palette)
#00FFFF (Pure cyan - too digital, use teal instead)
#FFFFFF (Pure white - only for highlights, never backgrounds)
production_guidelines.forbidden_rationale: Pure digital RGB colors (100% saturation primaries) clash with Studio Ghibli watercolor aesthetic and narrative's analog-digital synthesis theme. Use natural, slightly desaturated equivalents.
color_consistency_rules: Luna ALWAYS has silver bracelet visible (#C0C0C0) - non-negotiable identifier
Mateo ALWAYS has earth tone + golden accent combo - his signature
Vega NEVER has warm accent until final frame (redemption possibility) - she's closed
Abuela's palette NEVER changes saturation - she's constant
Teal (#20B2AA) absent Act 1 - its emergence is plot point
Family dinner scenes ALWAYS warm lit (3400-3800K) - sanctuary visual
Ministry scenes ALWAYS cool lit (6000-6500K) unless Luna's warmth invading
Bodega ALWAYS warm afternoon light (3600K) - community hub consistency
Act 3 finale MUST be golden hour (3200K) - earned warmth
Digital screens warm from blue to teal across acts - tracks Luna's journey

cool_tension.use_for: Ministry, surveillance, Vega's spaces, digital isolation Act 1

examples.lighting: Unified warm with slight cool rim on Luna (digital past still present)
examples.background: Bodega or rooftop - warm browns #CD853F, afternoon sun
examples.avoid: Don't let cool blue dominate Luna anymore. Teal yes, steel blue no.

examples.color_direction: Luna #F08080 vibrant coral, Vega #708090 slate + #2F4F4F dark slate. Maximum temperature contrast. NO blending of colors.
examples.lighting: Split: Luna warm 3800K, Vega cool 6500K. Visible split in frame.
examples.avoid: Do NOT warm Vega's palette (except tiny hint final frame Act 3). Do NOT cool Luna's palette.

examples.color_direction: Unified warm family: #F5DEB3 (Abuela), #8B4513 (table/food), #C68E6F (family skin tones), warm browns. EXCEPT Luna: #4682B4 cool digital glow on face - uncomfortable contrast.
examples.lighting: Warm 3400K overhead, 6500K laptop screen on Luna's face only

character_proximity_rules.rule_1: When Luna and Mateo physically close (< 2 feet in frame), their colors begin blending in background/lighting. Teal appears.
character_proximity_rules.rule_2: When Luna and Vega in frame, maintain color separation. No blending until final Act 3 frame (slight teal in Vega).
character_proximity_rules.rule_3: Abuela's colors never blend with environment - she radiates own warmth regardless of surroundings.
character_proximity_rules.rule_4: Felix's colors always harmonize with whoever he's near - he's chromatic mediator.

color_bleeding_guidelines.warm_to_cool_spaces: When warm character enters cool space (Luna in Ministry), their warmth creates visible warm glow around them. Cool space cannot fully suppress their color.
color_bleeding_guidelines.cool_to_warm_spaces: When cool character enters warm space (Vega rare family interaction), their cool creates visible temperature drop. Warm space dulls slightly in their immediate area.
color_bleeding_guidelines.projection_art_special: Mateo's golden projection light (#FFD700) overwrites ANY environmental color. Transforms cool Ministry slate to warm gold - visual conquest.

environmental_influence.act_1_digital_isolation: Digital screen glow (#4682B4) should cast cool light on Luna's face even in warm environments. Represents digital world's influence.
environmental_influence.act_2_transition: Screens warm from blue to teal. Change visible and intentional - represents Luna's transformation.
environmental_influence.act_3_integration: Screens now warm teal (#20B2AA), blend with environment. Digital no longer invasive but integrated.

technical_notes.color_space: sRGB for digital production, convert to P3 if needed for wide-gamut displays
technical_notes.calibration: All hex codes assume D65 white point, 2.2 gamma
technical_notes.accessibility: Ensure minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio between text and backgrounds. Luna's coral (#F08080) on white = 3.1:1 (FAIL) - use darker backgrounds or darkened text.
technical_notes.print_considerations: If printed materials needed, convert to CMYK carefully - coral may shift pink, teal may shift green. Test prints essential.
technical_notes.animation_color_holds: For consistent color across frames, use provided hex codes exactly. Slight variations acceptable for lighting, but hue must remain constant.
technical_notes.ghibli_watercolor_texture: Add subtle paper grain (10-15% opacity) and slight color variation (±5% in saturation/brightness) for authentic watercolor feel. Avoid pure flat digital colors.
